alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 11:00PM CDT until March 24 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Little River near Tecumseh affecting Seminole and Pottawatomie Counties.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC125-133-241600- /O.NEW.KOUN.FL.W.0002.230324T0600Z-230324T2227Z/ /TCMO2.1.ER.230324T0600Z.230324T1200Z.230324T1626Z.NO/ 1100 PM CDT Thu Mar 23 2023 ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River near Tecumseh. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding to depths of 2 feet occurs over croplands... pastures... and rural roads along the river. The area affected is entirely rural... and downstream of Lake Thunderbird... from near Macomb in Pottawatomie County to near Bowlegs in western Seminole County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 13.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
